means: poem ： 通常指一首诗或诗体文。
verse ： 多指诗句、诗行或诗节，也可作诗歌、韵文的总称。

sentence.Network_en: I myself enjoy cinema, poetry, eating out and long walks.
sentence.Network_cn: 我本人喜欢电影、诗歌、外出吃饭和远途散步。

sentence.Network_en: I think that a lot of poetry published today is obscurantist nonsense.
sentence.Network_cn: 我认为当今出版的很多诗歌都是故弄玄虚的无病呻吟。

sentence.Network_en: Her editors wanted her to cut out the poetry from her novel.
sentence.Network_cn: 编辑们想让她把这首诗从她的小说中删去。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from medieval Latin poetria, from Latin poeta 'poet'. In early use the word sometimes referred to creative literature in general

entry.tran: （作为文学形式的）诗，诗歌，韵文
entry.def: Poems, considered as a form of literature, are referred to as poetry .

example.ex: Lawrence Durrell wrote a great deal of poetry...
example.tran: 劳伦斯·达雷尔创作了大量的诗歌。

entry.tran: 诗的意境；诗一般美的事物
entry.def: You can describe something very beautiful as poetry .

example.ex: His music is purer poetry than a poem in words.
example.tran: 他的音乐比真正的诗歌更具诗意。

means.word_mean: 2. any communication resembling poetry in beauty or the evocation of feeling

auth_sentence.content: Poetry is under threat on that, we agree.
auth_sentence.res_content: Poetry is under threat on that, we agree.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Poetry is under threat on that, we agree.

auth_sentence.content: Lately he has been trying his hand at poetry.
auth_sentence.res_content: Lately he has been trying his hand at poetry.

auth_sentence.content: Poetry is not a lie that tells the truth.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 集合名词,通常放在一个完整的单词后面,表"整体"; 2. 表名词,通常放在一个完整的单词后面,表"场地,物等"; 3. 表名词,通常放在一个完整的单词后面,表"行业,学科"; 4. 表名词,通常放在一个完整的单词后面,表"状态,性质"

stems_affixes.word_buile: citizen市民,公民+ry整体→n.全体公民
gent绅士,假绅士+ry整体→n.贵族们
peasant农夫,乡下人+ry整体→n.农民[总称]

stems_affixes.value_cn: 铸造,翻砂,铸工厂,玻璃厂,铸造厂
stems_affixes.word_buile: found制造+ry场地,物等→n.铸造,翻砂,铸工厂,玻璃厂,铸造厂

stems_affixes.value_cn: 洗衣房[店];待洗衣物,所洗衣物
stems_affixes.word_buile: laund洗+ry场地,物等→n.洗衣房[店];待洗衣物,所洗衣物
lor+ry场地,物等→n.卡车,铁路货车
quar采石,来自square+ry场地,物等→n.猎物,追求物
pant+ry场地,物等→n.食品柜,餐具室
forest森林+ry行业,学科→n.林产,森林地
husband丈夫+ry行业,学科→丈夫干农活→务农
palmist看手相的人+ry行业,学科→n.相手术
artist艺术家,画家+ry表名词→n.艺术技巧
handit匪徒+ry状态,性质→n.盗贼行为,贼党
mimic模仿者+ry状态,性质→n.模仿,[动物等]拟态伪装
parquet镶木地板+ry状态,性质→n.镶木地板艺术或图案
rival竞争者,对手+ry状态,性质→n.竞争,对抗

Sentence.sentence: For more than two decades, starting in the 1960s, the poet Ted Hughes sat on the judging panel of an annual poetry competition for British schoolchildren.
The rigorous requirements placed on the writing of poetry stimulate the poet's creativity
Ted Hughes discovered many long poems submitted for poetry competition were composed on computers.

means.word_mean: 诗篇, 诗歌, 诗集

sentences.cn: 诗歌是很难写的艺术体裁。

sentences.en: He wrote a very beautiful poetry.
sentences.cn: 他所写的是一种非常优美的诗。

jushi.chinese: 诗歌是很难写的艺术体裁。

jushi.english: He wrote a very beautiful poetry.
jushi.chinese: 他所写的是一种非常优美的诗。

jushi.english: The dancer has poetry in her movements.
jushi.chinese: 那舞蹈演员的动作颇有诗意。
